T07udanav_u:2: stīnam iddham vinodya iha sampraharṣya ca mānasam / [stīnamiddham]
T07udanav_u:3: śṛṇuta imam pravakṣyāmi udānam jina bhāṣitam //
T07udanav_u:4: evam uktam bhagavatā sarva abhijñena tāyinā /
T07udanav_u:6: anityā bata saṃskārā utpāda vyaya dharmiṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:7: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣām vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
T07udanav_u:8: ko nu harṣaḥ ka;ānanda;evam prajvalite sati /
T07udanav_u:9: andha kāram praviṣṭāḥ stha pradīpam na gaveṣatha //
T07udanav_u:10: yāni imāny apaviddhāni vikṣiptāni diśo diśam /
T07udanav_u:11: kapota varṇāny asthīni tāni drṣṭvā iha kā ratiḥ //
T07udanav_u:12: yām eva prathamām rātrim garbhe vasati mānavaḥ /
T07udanav_u:13: aviṣṭhitaḥ sa vrajati gataś ca na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:14: sāyam eke na dṛśyante kālyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:15: kālyam ca eke na dṛṣyante sāyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ //
T07udanav_u:16: tatra ko viśvasen martyo daharo asmi iti jīvite /
T07udanav_u:17: daharā api ṃriyante hi narā nāryaś ca-n-ekaśaḥ // [anekaśaḥ]
T07udanav_u:18: garbha;eke vinaśyante tathā eke sūtikā kule /
T07udanav_u:19: parisṛptās tathā hy eke tathā eke paridhāvinaḥ //
T07udanav_u:20: ye ca vṛddhā ye ca dahrā ye ca madhyama puruṣāḥ / [pūruṣāḥ]
T07udanav_u:21: anupūrvam pravrajanti phalam pakvam va bandhanāt //
T07udanav_u:22: yathā phalānām pakvānām nityam patanato bhayam /
T07udanav_u:23: evam jātasya martyasya nityam maraṇato bhayam //
T07udanav_u:24: yathā api kumbha kāreṇa mṛttikā bhājanam kṛtam /
T07udanav_u:25: sarvam bhedana paryantam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:26: yathā api tantre vitate yad yad uktam samupyate /
T07udanav_u:27: alpam bhavati vātavyam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:30: yathā nadī pārvatīyā gacchate na nivartate /
T07udanav_u:31: evam āyur manuṣyāṇām gacchate na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:32: kisaram ca parittam ca tac ca duhkhena samyutam /
T07udanav_u:33: udake daṇḍa rājī iva kṣipram eva vinaśyati //
T07udanav_u:34: yathā daṇḍena gopālo gāḥ prāpayati gocaram /
T07udanav_u:35: evam rogair jarā mṛtyuḥ āyuḥ prāpayate nṛṇām //
T07udanav_u:36: atiyānti hy aho rātrā jīvitam ca uparudhyate /
T07udanav_u:37: āyuḥ kṣīyati martyānām kunadīṣu yathā odakam //
T07udanav_u:39: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrgham śrāntasya yojanam /
T07udanav_u:41: putro me asti dhanam me asti ity evam bālo vihanyate /
T07udanav_u:42: ātmā eva hy ātmano na asti kasya putraḥ kuto dhanam //
T07udanav_u:44: anekāni sahasrāṇi nara nārī śatāni ca /
T07udanav_u:45: bhogān vai samudānīya vaśam gacchanti mṛtyunaḥ //
T07udanav_u:46: sarve kṣaya antā nicayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ /
T07udanav_u:47: samyogā viprayoga antā maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:48: sarve sattvā mariṣyanti maraṇa antam hi jīvitam / [satvā]
T07udanav_u:49: yathā karma gamiṣyanti puṇya pāpa phala upagāḥ //
T07udanav_u:50: narakam pāpa karmāṇaḥ kṛta puṇyās tu sad gatim /
T07udanav_u:51: anye tu mārgam bhāvya iha nirvāsyanti nirāsravāḥ // [bhāvyeha]
T07udanav_u:52: na eva antarīk se na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivaram praviśya /
T07udanav_u:53: na vidyate asau pṛthivī pradeśo yatra sthitam na prasaheta mṛtyuH //
T07udanav_u:54: ye ca iha bhūtā bhaviṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve gamiṣyanti prahāya deham /
T07udanav_u:55: tām sarva hānim kuśalo viditvā dharme sthito brahmacaryam careta //
T07udanav_u:56: jīrṇam ca dṛṣṭvā iha tathā eva rogiṇam mṛtam ca dṛṣṭvā vyapayāta cetasam /
T07udanav_u:57: jahau sa dhīro gṛha bandhanāni kāmā hi lokasya na supraheyāḥ //
T07udanav_u:58: jīryanti vai rāja rathāḥ sucitrā hy atho śarīram api jarām upaiti /
T07udanav_u:59: satām tu dharmo na jarām upaiti santo hi tam satsu nivedayanti //
T07udanav_u:60: dhik tvām astu jare grāmye virūpa karaṇī hy asi /
T07udanav_u:61: tathā mano ramam bimbam jarayā hy abhimarditam //
T07udanav_u:62: yo api varṣa śatam jīvet so api mṛtyu parāyaṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:63: anu hy enam jarā hanti vyādhir vā yadi vā antakaḥ //
T07udanav_u:64: sadā vrajanti hy anivartamānā divā ca rātrau ca vilujyamānāḥ /
T07udanav_u:65: matsyā;iva atīva hi tapyamānā duhkhena jāti maraṇena yuktāḥ //
T07udanav_u:66: āyur divā ca rātrau ca caratas tiṣṭhatas tathā /
T07udanav_u:67: nadīnām vā yathā sroto gacchate na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:68: yeṣām rātri diva apāye hy āyur alpataram bhavet /
T07udanav_u:69: alpa udake va matsyānām kā nu teṣām ratir bhavet //
T07udanav_u:70: parijīrṇam idam rūpam roga nīḍam prabhaṅguram /
T07udanav_u:71: bhetsyate pūty asaṃdeham maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:72: aciram bata kāyo ayam pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate /
T07udanav_u:73: śunyo vyapeta vijñāno nirastam vā kaḍaṅgaram // [śūnyo]
T07udanav_u:74: kim anena śarīreṇa sravatā pūutinā sadā /
T07udanav_u:75: nityam roga abhibhūtena jarā maraṇa bhīruṇā //
T07udanav_u:76: anena pūti kāyena hy ātureṇa prabhaṅguṇā /
T07udanav_u:77: nigacchatha parām śāntim yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T07udanav_u:78: iha varṣam kariṣyāmi hemantam grīṣmam eva ca /
T07udanav_u:79: bālo vicintayaty evam antarāyam na paśyati //
T07udanav_u:80: tam putra paśu sammattam vyāsakta manasam naram /
T07udanav_u:81: sutpam grāmam mahaugha eva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati // [mahaughaiva]
T07udanav_u:82: na santi putrās trāṇāya na pitā na api bāndhavāḥ /
T07udanav_u:83: antakena abhibhūtasya na hi trāṇā bhavanti te //
T07udanav_u:84: idam kṛtam me kartavyam idam kṛtvā bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:85: ity evam spandato martyān jarā mṛtyuś ca mardati //
T07udanav_u:86: tasmāt sadā dhyāna ratāḥ samāhitā hy ātāpino jāti jarā anta darśinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:87: māram sasainyam hy abhibhūya bhikṣavo bhaveta jātī maraṇasya pāragāḥ //
T07udanav_u:89: kāma jānāmi te mūlam saṃkalpāt kāma jāyase /
T07udanav_u:90: na tvām saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
T07udanav_u:91: kāmebhyo jāyate śokaḥ kāmebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:92: kāmebhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:93: ratibhyo jāyate śoko ratibhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:94: ratibhhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:95: madhura agrā vipāke tu kaṭukā hy abhinanditāḥ /
T07udanav_u:96: kāmā dahanti vai bālān ulkā iva amuñcataḥ karam //
T07udanav_u:97: na tad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasam dāravam balbajam vā /
T07udanav_u:98: saṃrakta cittasya hi manda buddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā;avekṣā //
T07udanav_u:99: etad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiram duṣpramokṣam /
T07udanav_u:100: etad api chittvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣiṇaḥ kāma sukham prahāya //
T07udanav_u:101: na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalpa rāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
T07udanav_u:102: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathā eva loke;atha atra dhīrā vinayanti chandam // [cchandam]
T07udanav_u:103: na santi nityā manujeṣu kāmāḥ santi tv anityāḥ kāmino yatra baddhāḥ /
T07udanav_u:104: tāṃs tu prahāya hy apunar bhavāya hy anāgatam mṛtyu dheyam vadāmi //
T07udanav_u:105: chanda jāto hy avasrāvī manasā anāvilo bhavet /
T07udanav_u:106: kāmeṣu tv apratibaddha citta;ūrdhva sroto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:107: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokam stokam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
T07udanav_u:108: karmāro rajatasya eva nirdhamen malam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:110: yad yaj jahāti kāmānām tat tat sampadyate sukham //
T07udanav_u:111: sarvam cet sukham iccheta sarva kāmān parityajet / [kāmām]
T07udanav_u:112: sarva kāma parityāgī hy atyantam sukham edhate //
T07udanav_u:113: yāvat kāmān anusaran na tṛptim manaso adhyagāt /
T07udanav_u:114: tato nivṛttim pratipaśyamānās te vai tṛptāḥ prajñayā ye sutṛptāḥ //
T07udanav_u:115: śreyasī prajñayā tṛptir na hi kāmair vitṛpyate /
T07udanav_u:116: prajñayā puruṣam tṛptam tṛṣṇā na kurute vaśam //
T07udanav_u:117: gṛddhā hi kāmeṣu narāḥ pramattā hy adharme bata te ratāḥ /
T07udanav_u:118: antarāyam na te paśyanty alpake jīvite sati /
T07udanav_u:119: durmedhasam hanti bhogo na tv iha ātma gaveṣiṇam /
T07udanav_u:120: durmedhā bhoga tṛṣṇābhir hanty ātmānam atho parān //
T07udanav_u:121: na karṣāpaṇa varṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate /
T07udanav_u:122: alpa āsvāda sukhāḥ kāmā;iti vijñāya paṇḍitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:123: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratim na adhigacchati /
T07udanav_u:124: tṛṣṇā kṣaya rato bhavati buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā //
T07udanav_u:125: parvato api suvarṇasya samo himavatā bhavet /
T07udanav_u:126: vittam tam nālam ekasya etaj jñātvā samam caret // [vittam tam na alam ekasya]
T07udanav_u:127: duhkham hi yo veda yato nidānam kāmeṣu jantu sa katham rameta /
T07udanav_u:128: upadhim hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasya eva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet //
T07udanav_u:130: vitarka pramathitasya jantunas tīvra rāgasya śubha anudarśinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:131: bhūyas tṛṣṇā pravardhate gāḍham hy eṣa karoti bandhanam //
T07udanav_u:132: vitarka vyupaśame tu yo rato hy aśubham bhāvayate sadā smṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:133: tṛṣṇā hy eṣa prahāsyate sa tu khalu pūti karoti bandhanam // [eṣā]?
T07udanav_u:134: kāma andha jāla prakṣiptās tṛṣṇayā ācchāditāḥ prajāḥ /
T07udanav_u:135: pramattā bandhane baddhā matsyavat kupinā mukhe /
T07udanav_u:136: jarā maraṇam āyānti vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka;iva mātaram //
T07udanav_u:137: manujasya pramatta cāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati mālutā iva hi / [māluteva hi]
T07udanav_u:138: sa hi saṃsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane //
T07udanav_u:139: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ /
T07udanav_u:140: ye sātasitāḥ sukha eṣiṇas te vai jāti jarā upagā narāḥ //
T07udanav_u:141: tṛṣṇābhir upaskṛtāḥ prajāḥ paridhāvanti śaśā va vāgurām /
T07udanav_u:142: samyojanaiḥ saṅga saktā duhkham yānti punaḥ punaś cira rātram //
T07udanav_u:143: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ sattvā rakta cittā bhavā bhave / [satvā]
T07udanav_u:144: te yoga yukta māreṇa hy ayoga kṣemiṇo janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:145: jarā maraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ //
T07udanav_u:146: yas tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T07udanav_u:148: ya;etām sahate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T07udanav_u:149: śokās tasya pravardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā //
T07udanav_u:150: yas tv etām tyajate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T07udanav_u:151: śokās tasya nivartante;uda bindur iva puṣkarāt //
T07udanav_u:152: tad vai vadāmi bhadram vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:153: tṛṣṇām samūlam khanata uśīra arthī iva bīraṇām /
T07udanav_u:154: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khāta mūlāyā na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:155: tṛṣṇā dvitīyaḥ puruṣo dīrgham adhvānam āśayā /
T07udanav_u:156: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsarate garbham eti punaḥ punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:157: ittham bhāva anyathī bhāvaḥ saṃsāre tv āgatim gatim //
T07udanav_u:158: tām tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T07udanav_u:159: na asau punaḥ saṃsarate tṛṣṇā hy asya na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:160: yayā devā manuṣyāś ca sitās tiṣṭhanti hārthikāḥ /
T07udanav_u:161: tarata etām viṣaktikām kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:162: kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:163: tṛṣṇā hi hetuḥ saritā viṣaktikā gaṇḍasya nityam visṛtā iha jālinī /
T07udanav_u:164: latām pipāsām apanīya sarvaśo nivartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T07udanav_u:165: yathā api mūlair anupadrutaiḥ sadā chinno api vṛkṣaḥ punar eva jāyate /
T07udanav_u:166: evam hi tṛṣṇā anuśayair anuddhṛtair nirvartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T07udanav_u:167: yathā api śalyo dṛḍham ātmanā kṛtas tam eva hanyād balasā tv adhiṣṭhitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:168: tathā tv iha ādhyātma samutthitā latās tṛṣṇā vadhāya upanayanti prāṇinām //
T07udanav_u:169: etad ādīnavam jñātvā tṛṣṇā duhkhasya sambhavam /
T07udanav_u:170: vīta tṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:172: apramādo hy amṛta padam pramādo mṛtyunaḥ padam /
T07udanav_u:173: apramattā na ṃriyante ye pramattāḥ sadā mṛtāḥ //
T07udanav_u:174: etām viśeṣatām jñātvā hy apramādasya paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:175: apramādam pramudyeta nityam āryaḥ sva gocaram //
T07udanav_u:177: spṛśanti dhīrā nirvāṇam yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T07udanav_u:179: prajñā prasādam āruhya tv aśokaḥ śokinīm prajām /
T07udanav_u:180: parvatasthā eva bhūmisthān dhīro bālān avekṣate //
T07udanav_u:182: dvīpam karoti medhāvī tam ogho na abhimardati //
T07udanav_u:183: utthānavataḥ smṛta ātmanaḥ śubha cittasya niśāmya cāriṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:184: samyatasya hi dharma jīvino hy apramattasya yaśo abhivardhate //
T07udanav_u:185: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratatam mauna padeṣu śikṣata /
T07udanav_u:186: śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛta ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:187: hīnām dharmām na seveta pramādena na saṃvaset /
T07udanav_u:188: mithyā dṛṣṭim na roceta na bhavel loka vardhanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:189: samyag dṛṣṭir adhīmātrā laukikī yasya vidyate /
T07udanav_u:190: api jāti sahasrāṇi na asau gacchati durgatim //
T07udanav_u:192: apramādam tu medhāvī dhanam śreṣṭhī iva rakṣati //
T07udanav_u:194: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy āsrava kṣayam //
T07udanav_u:195: pramādam na anuyujyeta na kāma rati saṃstavam /
T07udanav_u:196: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy acalam sukham //
T07udanav_u:197: na ayam pramāda kālaḥ syād aprāpte hy āsrava kṣaye /
T07udanav_u:198: māraḥ pramattam anveti siṃham vā mṛga mātṛkā //
T07udanav_u:199: sthānāni catvāri naraḥ pramatta;āpadyate yaḥ para dāra sevī /
T07udanav_u:200: apuṇya lābham hy anikāma śayyām nindām tṛtīyam narakam caturtham //
T07udanav_u:201: apuṇya lābham ca gatim ca pāpikām bhītasya bhītābhir atha alpikām ratim/
T07udanav_u:202: nindām ca paśyan nwpateś ca daṇḍam parasya dārāṇi vivarjayeta //
T07udanav_u:203: apuṇya lābhaś ca gatiś ca pāpikā bhītasya bhītābhir atha alpikā ratiḥ /
T07udanav_u:204: rājā ca daṇḍam gurukam dadāti kāyasya bhedād narakeṣu paśyate //
T07udanav_u:205: pratiyatyā iva tat kuryād yaj jānedd hitam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:206: na śākaṭika cintābhir mandam dhīraḥ parākramet //
T07udanav_u:207: yathā śākaṭiko mārgam samam hitvā mahā patham /
T07udanav_u:208: viṣamam mārgam āgamya chinna akṣaḥ śocate bhṛśam //
T07udanav_u:209: evam dharmād apakramya hy adharmam anuvartya ca /
T07udanav_u:210: bālo mṛtyu vaśam prāptaś chinna akṣa;iva śocate //
T07udanav_u:211: yat kṛtyam tad apaviddham akṛtyam kriyate punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:213: āsravās teṣu vardhante;ārāt te hy āsrava kṣayāt //
T07udanav_u:214: yeṣām tu susamārabdhā nityam kāya gatā smṛtiḥ /
T07udanav_u:215: akṛtyam te na kurvanti kṛtye sātatya kāriṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:217: na tāvatā dharma dharo yāvatā bahu bhāṣate /
T07udanav_u:218: yas tv iha alpam api śrutvā dharmam kāyena vai spṛśet /
T07udanav_u:219: sa vai dharma dharo bhavati yo dharme na pramādyate //
T07udanav_u:220: subahv api iha sahitam bhāṣamāṇo na tat karo bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ /
T07udanav_u:221: gopā eva gāḥ saṃgaṇayan pareṣām na bhāgavān śrāmaṇya arthasya bhavati // [bhāgavān śrāmaṇya arthasya]
T07udanav_u:222: alpam api cet sahitam bhāṣamāṇo dharmasya bhavati hy anudharma cārī /
T07udanav_u:223: rāgam ca doṣam ca tathaiva moham prahāya bhāgī śrāmaṇya arthasya bhavati //
T07udanav_u:227: apramatto hy ubhāv arthāv atigṛhṇāti paṇḍitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:228: dṛṣṭa dhārmika;eko arthas tathā anyaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ /
T07udanav_u:229: artha abhisamayād dhīraḥ paṇḍito hi nirucyate //

T07udanav_u:232: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /

T07udanav_u:240: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /

T07udanav_u:245: tad aṅgam paribudhyadhvam smṛtir mā antar adhīyata //
T07udanav_u:246: uttiṣṭhen na pramādyeta dharmam sucaritam caret /

T07udanav_u:248: apramāda ratā bhavata suśīlā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ /
T07udanav_u:251: dhunidhvam mṛtyunaḥ sainyam naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // [naḍa agāram]
T07udanav_u:252: yo hy asmin dharma vinaye tv apramatto bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:253: prahāya jāti saṃsāram duhkhasya antam sa yāsyati //
T07udanav_u:255: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:256: priyebhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:257: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:258: priyāṇām anyathī bhāvād unmādam api gacchati //
T07udanav_u:259: śokā hi ye vai paridevitam ca duhkham ca lokasya hi naikarūpam /
T07udanav_u:260: priyam pratītya iha tad asti sarvam priye asati syān na kathaṃcid etat //
T07udanav_u:261: tasmādd hi te sukhitā vīta śokā yeṣām priyam na asti kathaṃcid eva /
T07udanav_u:262: tasmād aśokam padam eṣamāṇaḥ priyam na kurvīta hi jīva loke //
T07udanav_u:263: mā priyaiḥ saṃgamo jātu mā ca syād apriyaiḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:264: priyāṇām adarśanam duhkham apriyāṇām ca dharśanam //
T07udanav_u:265: priyāṇām ca vinā bhāvād apriyāṇām ca saṃgamāt /
T07udanav_u:267: priyam mṛtam kāla gatam jñātayaḥ sahitāḥ sthitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:268: śocanti dīrgham adhvānam duhkho hi priya saṃgamaḥ //
T07udanav_u:269: tasmāt priyam na kurvīta priya bhāvo hi pāpakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:270: granthās teṣām na vidyante yeṣām na asti priya apriyam /
T07udanav_u:271: ayuge yujya ca ātmānam yuge ca ayujya sarvadā /
T07udanav_u:272: artham hitvā priya grāhī spṛhayaty artha yogine //
T07udanav_u:273: priya rūpa sāta grathitā deva kāyāḥ pṛthak sthitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:274: āghādinaḥ paridyūnā mṛtyu rāja vaśam gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:275: ye vai divā ca rātrau caiva;apramattāḥ priyam jahati nityam /
T07udanav_u:276: te vai khananti tv agha mūlam mṛtyu-r-āmiṣam durativartyam //
T07udanav_u:277: asādhu sādhu rūpeṇa priya rūpeṇa ca apriyam /
T07udanav_u:279: ātmānam cet priyam vidyān na enam pāpena yojayet /
T07udanav_u:280: na hy etat sulabham bhavati sukham duṣkṛta kāriṇā //
T07udanav_u:281: ātmānam cet priyam vidyān na enam pāpena yojayet /
T07udanav_u:282: etadd hi sulabham bhavati sukham sukṛta kāriṇā //
T07udanav_u:283: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād rakṣed enam surakṣitam /
T07udanav_u:284: yathā pratyanta nagaram gambhīra parikham dṛḍham /
T07udanav_u:286: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād gopayet tam sugopitam /
T07udanav_u:287: yathā pratyanta nagaram guptam antar bahisthiram / [antar bahiḥ sthiram]
T07udanav_u:288: evam gopayata ātmānam kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:289: kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:290: sarvā diśas tv anuparigamya cetasā na eva adhyagāt priyataram ātmanaḥ kvacit /
T07udanav_u:291: evam priyaḥ pṛthag ātmā pareṣām tasmān na hiṃsyāt param ātma kāraṇam //
T07udanav_u:292: sarve daṇḍasya bibhyanti sarveṣām jīvitam priyam /
T07udanav_u:293: ātmānam upamām kṛtvā na eva hanyān na ghātayet //
T07udanav_u:294: cira pravāsinam yadvad dūrataḥ svastinā āgatam /
T07udanav_u:295: jñātayaḥ suhṛdo mitrāś ca abhinandanti āgatam //
T07udanav_u:296: kṛta puṇyam tathā martyam asmāṃl lokāt param gatam / [asmāl lokāt]
T07udanav_u:297: puṇyāny eva abhinandanti priyam jñātim iva āgatam //
T07udanav_u:299: puṇyāni para loke hi pratiṣṭhā prāṇinām hi sā //
T07udanav_u:300: puṇyam devāḥ praśaṃsanti sama caryām ca yaś caret /
T07udanav_u:301: iha ca anindito bhavati pretya svarge ca modate //
T07udanav_u:302: dharmastham śīla sampannam hrīmantam satya vādinam /
T07udanav_u:303: ātmanaḥ kārakam santam tam janaḥ kurute priyam //
T07udanav_u:304: pareṣām ca priyo bhavati hy ātma artham kriyate api ca /
T07udanav_u:305: dṛṣṭe ca dharme prāśaṃsyaḥ sāmparāye ca sad gatiḥ //
T07udanav_u:306: avavadeta anuśāsīta ca asabhyāc ca nivārayet /
T07udanav_u:307: asatām na priyo bhavati satām bhavati tu priyaḥ //
T07udanav_u:308: asantaś caiva santaś ca nānā yānti tv itaś cyutāḥ /
T07udanav_u:309: asanto narakam yānti santaḥ svarga parāyaṇāḥ //
T07udanav_u:311: śīlam rakṣeta medhāvī prārthayan vai sukha trayam / [prārthayaṃ]
T07udanav_u:312: praśaṃsā vitta lābham ca pretya svarge ca modanam //
T07udanav_u:313: sthānāny etāni sampaśyan śīlam rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:314: āryo darśana sampannaḥ sa loke labhate śivam //
T07udanav_u:315: sukham śīla samādānam kāyo na paridahyate /
T07udanav_u:316: sukham ca rātrau svapati pratibhuddhaś ca nandati //
T07udanav_u:317: śīlam yāvaj jarā sādhu śraddhā sādhu pratiṣṭhitā /
T07udanav_u:318: prajñā narāṇām ratnam vai puṇyam coraiḥ sudurharam //
T07udanav_u:319: kṛtvā puṇyāni saprajño dattvā dānāni śīlavān / [datvā]
T07udanav_u:320: iha ca atha paratra asau sukham samadhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:321: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣur indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:322: bhojane ca api mātrajño yukto jāgarikāsu ca //
T07udanav_u:323: viharann evam ātāpī hy aho rātram atandritaḥ /
T07udanav_u:324: abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:325: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣuś cittam prajñām ca bhāvayet /
T07udanav_u:326: ātāpī nipako nityam prāpnuyād duhkha saṃkṣayam //
T07udanav_u:327: tasmāt satata śīlī syāt samādher anurakṣakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:329: sa tu vikṣīṇa samyogaḥ kṣīṇa māno niraupadhiḥ /
T07udanav_u:330: kāyasya bhedat saprajñaḥ saṃkhyān na upaiti nirvṛtaḥ //
T07udanav_u:331: śīlam samādhiḥ prajñā ca yasya hy ete subhāvitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:332: so atyanta niṣṭho vimalas tv aśokaḥ kṣīṇa sambhavaḥ //
T07udanav_u:334: atikramya māra viṣayam ādityo vā virocate //
T07udanav_u:336: śīlam samādhiḥ prajñā ca pāripūrim na gacchati //
T07udanav_u:337: channam eva abhivarṣati vivṛtam na abhivarṣati /
T07udanav_u:338: tasmādd hi channam vivared evam tam na abhivarṣati // [cchannam]
T07udanav_u:339: etadd hi dṛṣṭvā śikṣeta sadā śīleṣu paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:340: nirvāṇa gamanam mārgam kṣipram eva viśodhayet //
T07udanav_u:341: na puṣpa gandhaḥ prativātam eti na vāhnijāt tagarāc candanād vā /
T07udanav_u:342: satām tu gandhaḥ prativātam eti sarvā diśaḥ sat puruṣaḥ pravāti //
T07udanav_u:343: tagarāc candanāc ca api vārṣikāyās tathā utpalāt /
T07udanav_u:344: etebhyo gandha jātebhyaḥ śīla gandhas tv anuttaraḥ //
T07udanav_u:345: alpa mātro hy ayam gandho yo ayam tagara candanāt /
T07udanav_u:346: yas tu śīlavatām gandho vāti deveṣv api iha saḥ /
T07udanav_u:348: samyag ājñā vimuktānām māro mārgam na vindati //
T07udanav_u:349: eṣa kṣema gamo mārga;eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye /
T07udanav_u:352: kāya pradoṣam rakṣeta syāt kāyena susaṃvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:353: kāya duścaritam hitvā kāyena sukṛtam caret //
T07udanav_u:354: vācaḥ pradoṣam rakṣeta vacasā saṃvṛto bhavet /
T07udanav_u:355: vāco duścaritam hitvā vācā sucaritam caret //
T07udanav_u:356: manaḥ pradoṣam rakṣeta manasā saṃvṛto bhavet /
T07udanav_u:357: mano duścaritam hitvā manaḥ sucaritam caret //
T07udanav_u:358: kāya duścaritam hitvā vaco duścaritāni ca /
T07udanav_u:359: mano duścaritam hitvā yac ca anyad doṣa saṃhitam //
T07udanav_u:360: kāyena kuśalam kuryād vacasā kuśalam bahu /
T07udanav_u:362: kāyena kuśalam kṛtvā vacasā cetasā api ca /
T07udanav_u:363: iha ca atha paratra asau sukham samadhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:364: ahiṃsakā vai munayo nityam kāyena saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:365: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:366: ahiṃsakā vai munayo nityam vācā susaṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:367: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:368: ahiṃsakā vai munayo manasā nitya saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:369: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:370: kāyena saṃvṛtā dhīrā dhīrā vācā susaṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:371: manasā saṃvṛtā dhīrā dhīrāḥ sarvatra saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:372: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:373: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā ca saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:374: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:375: sarvatra saṃvṛto bhikṣuḥ sarva duhkhāt pramucyate //
T07udanav_u:376: vācā anurakṣī manasā susaṃvṛtaḥ kāyena caiva akuśalam na kuryāt /
T07udanav_u:377: etām śubhām karma pathām viśodhayann ārādhayen mārgam ṛṣi praveditam //
T07udanav_u:379: abhūta vādī narakān upaiti yaś ca anyad apy ācarati iha karma /
T07udanav_u:380: ubhau hi tau pretya samau niruktau nihīna dharmau manujau paratra //
T07udanav_u:381: puruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe /
T07udanav_u:382: yayā chinatti ha ātmānam vācā durbhāṣitam vadan //
T07udanav_u:383: yo nindiyām praśaṃsati tān api nindati ye praśaṃsiyāḥ /
T07udanav_u:384: sa cinoti mukhena tam kalim kalinā tena sukham na vindati //
T07udanav_u:385: alpa mātro hy ayam kalir ya;ihha akṣeṇa dhanam parājayet /
T07udanav_u:386: ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣayet //
T07udanav_u:387: śatam sahasrāṇi nirarbudāni ṣaṭ triṃśatim pañca tathā arbudāni /
T07udanav_u:388: yān ārya garhī narakān upaiti vācam manaś ca praṇidhāya pāpakam //
T07udanav_u:389: asatam hi vadanti pāpa cittā narakam vardhayate vadhāya nityam /
T07udanav_u:390: anavadya balas titīkṣate tām manaso hy āvilatām vivarjayitvā // [titikṣate]
T07udanav_u:391: yaḥ śāsanam hy arhatām āryāṇām dharma jīvinām /
T07udanav_u:393: kalyāṇikām vimuñceta na eva muñceta pāpikām /
T07udanav_u:394: muktā kalyāṇikī śreyo muktā tapati pāpikā //
T07udanav_u:395: na ca mukte pramuñcet tām muñcamāno hi bādhyate /
T07udanav_u:396: na evam āryāḥ pramuñcanti muktā bālair hi pāpikā //
T07udanav_u:397: mukhena samyato bhikṣur manda bhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ /
T07udanav_u:398: artham dharmam ca deśayati madhuram tasya bhāṣitam //
T07udanav_u:399: subhāṣitam hy uttamam āhur āryā dharmam vaden na adharmam tad dvitīyam /
T07udanav_u:400: priyam vaden na apriyam tat tṛtīyam satyam vaden na asatyam tac caturtham //
T07udanav_u:401: tām eva vācam bhāṣeta yayā ātmānam na tāpayet /
T07udanav_u:402: parāṃś ca na vihiṃseta sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
T07udanav_u:403: priya udyam eva bhāṣeta yā hi vācā abhinanditā /
T07udanav_u:404: na ādadāti yayā pāpam bhāṣamāṇaḥ sadā priyam //
T07udanav_u:405: satyā syād amṛtā vācā satya vācā hy anuttarā /
T07udanav_u:406: satyam arthe ca dharme ca vācam āhuḥ pratiṣṭhitām //
T07udanav_u:407: yām buddho bhāṣate vācam kṣemām nirvāṇa prāptaye /
T07udanav_u:408: duhkhasya anta kriyā yuktām sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
T07udanav_u:410: eka dharmam atītasya mṛṣā vādasya jantunaḥ /
T07udanav_u:411: vitīrṇa para lokasya na akāryam pāpam asti yat //
T07udanav_u:412: śreyo hy ayoguḍā bhuktās taptā hy agni śikhā upamāḥ /
T07udanav_u:413: na tu bhuñjīita duhśīlo rāṣṭra piṇḍam asamyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:414: sa ced bibheṣi duhkhasya sa cet te duhkham apriyam /
T07udanav_u:415: mā kārṣīḥ pāpakam karma tv āvir vā yadi vā rahaḥ //
T07udanav_u:416: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kariṣyasi karoṣi vā /
T07udanav_u:417: na te duhkhāt pramokṣo asti hy utplutya api palāyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:418: na eva antarīkṣe na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivaram praviśya /
T07udanav_u:419: na vidyate asau pṛthivī pradeśo yatra sthitam na prasaheta karma //
T07udanav_u:420: kṛṣṇa śuklāni karmāṇi na praṇaśyanti dehinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:421: kālam prā - - - iṣyante kṛtāny upa---nāni ca //
T07udanav_u:422: yat pareṣām vigarheta karma dṛṣṭvā iha pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:423: ātmanā tan na kurvīta karma baddho hi pāpakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:424: ye kūṭa māna yogena viṣameṇa ca karmaṇā /
T07udanav_u:425: manuṣyān upahiṃsanti parato upakrameṇa vā / [paratopakrameṇa vā]
T07udanav_u:426: te vai prapātam prapatanti karma baddhā hi te janāḥ //
T07udanav_u:427: yat karoti naraḥ karma kalyāṇam atha pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:428: tasya tasya eva dāyādo na hi karma praṇaśyati //
T07udanav_u:429: vilumpate hi puruṣo yāvad asya upakalpate /
T07udanav_u:430: tato anye tam vilumpanti sa viloptā vilupyate //
T07udanav_u:431: kurvan hi manyate bālo na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:432: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām //
T07udanav_u:433: kurvan hi manyate bālo na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:434: paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
T07udanav_u:435: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kurvan bālo na budhyate /
T07udanav_u:436: karmabhiḥ svais tu durmedhā hy agni dagdha eva tapyate // [agni dagdhaiva tapyate]
T07udanav_u:437: caranti bālā duṣprajñā hy amitrair iva ca ātmabhiḥ /
T07udanav_u:438: kurvantaḥ pāpakam karma yad bhavati kaṭukam phalam //
T07udanav_u:439: na tat karma kṛtam sādhu yat kṛtvā hy anutapyate /
T07udanav_u:440: rudann aśru mukho yasya vipākam pratiṣevate //
T07udanav_u:441: tat tu karma kṛtam sādhu yat kṛtvā na anutapyate /
T07udanav_u:443: hasantaḥ pāpakam karma kurvanty ātma sukha eṣiṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:445: na hi pāpa kṛtam karma sadyaḥ kṣīram iva mūrchati / [mūrcchati]
T07udanav_u:446: dahan tad bālam anveti bhasma ācchanna;iva analaḥ //
T07udanav_u:447: na hi pāpa kṛtam karma sadyaḥ śastram iva kṛntati /
T07udanav_u:448: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām /
T07udanav_u:449: paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
T07udanav_u:450: ayaso hi malaḥ samutthitaḥ sa tad utthāya tam eva khādati /
T07udanav_u:451: evam hy aniśāmya cāriṇam svāni karmāṇi nayanti durgatim //
T07udanav_u:453: śraddhā atha hrī śīlam atha api dānam dharmā;ime sat puruṣa praśastāḥ /
T07udanav_u:454: etam hi mārgam divyam vadanti;etena asau gacchati deva lokam //
T07udanav_u:455: na vai kadaryā deva lokam vrajanti bālā hi te na praśaṃsanti dānam /
T07udanav_u:456: śrādhas tu dānam hy anumodamāno apy evam hy asau bhavati sukhī paratra //
T07udanav_u:457: śraddhā hi vittam puruṣasya śreṣṭham dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti /
T07udanav_u:458: satyam hi vai svādutamam rasānām prajñā ājīvī jīvinām śreṣṭha;uktaḥ //
T07udanav_u:459: śraddhā dhano hy arhatām dharmam nirvāṇa prāptaye /
T07udanav_u:460: śuśrūṣur labhate prajñām tatra tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ / [śuśruśur]
T07udanav_u:461: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena ca arṇavam /
T07udanav_u:463: śraddhā dvitīyā puruṣasya bhavati prajñā ca enam praśāsati /
T07udanav_u:464: nirvāṇa abhirato bhikṣuś chinatti bhava bandhanam //
T07udanav_u:465: yasya śraddhā ca śīlam caiva ahiṃsā samyamo damaḥ /
T07udanav_u:466: sa vānta doṣo medhāvī sādhu rūpo nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:467: śrāddhaḥ śīlena sampannas tyāgavān vīta matsaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:468: vrajate yatra yatra eva tatra tatra eva pūjyate //
T07udanav_u:469: yo jīva loke labhate śraddhām prajñām ca paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:470: tadd hi tasya dhanam śreṣṭham hīnam asya itarad dhanam //
T07udanav_u:471: āryāṇām darśanaḥ kāmaḥ sad dharma śravaṇe rataḥ /
T07udanav_u:472: vinīta mātsarya malaḥ sa vai śrāddho nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:473: śrāddho gṛhṇāti pātheyam puṇyam coraiḥ sudurharam /
T07udanav_u:474: coram harantam vārayati harantaḥ śramaṇāḥ priyāḥ /
T07udanav_u:476: dadanty eke yathā śraddhā yathā vibhavato janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:477: tatra yo durmanā bhavati pareṣām pāna bhojane /
T07udanav_u:478: na asau divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:479: yasya tv ete samucchinnās tāla mastakavadd hatāḥ / [mastakavad dhatāḥ]
T07udanav_u:480: sa vai divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:481: vīta śraddham na seveta hradam yadvadd hi nirjalam /
T07udanav_u:482: sa cet khanel labhet tatra vāri kardama gandhikam //
T07udanav_u:483: śrāddham prājñam tu seveta hradam yadvaj jala arthikaḥ /
T07udanav_u:484: acchodakam viprasannam śīta toyam anāvilam / [accha udakam]
T07udanav_u:485: na anuraktā;iti rajyeta hy atra vai dīryate janaḥ /
T07udanav_u:487: anitya kāma tṛṣṇā ca;apramādas tathā priyaḥ / [p.184]
T07udanav_u:488: śīlam sucaritam vāca karma śraddhā ca te daśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:490: chindhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmān praṇuda sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:491: na aprahāya muniḥ kāmān ekatvam adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:492: kurvāṇo hi sadā prājño dṛḍham eva parākramet /
T07udanav_u:493: śithilā khalu pravrajyā hy ādadāti puno rajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:494: yat kiṃcit śithilam karma saṃkliṣṭam vā api yat tapaḥ /
T07udanav_u:495: apariśuddham brahmacaryam na tad bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:496: śaro yathā durgṛhīto hastam eva apakṛntati /
T07udanav_u:498: śaro yathā sugṛhīto na hastam apakṛntati /
T07udanav_u:499: śrāmaṇyam suparāmṛṣṭam nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:500: duṣkaram dustitīkṣam ca śrāmaṇyam manda buddhinā / [dustitikṣam]
T07udanav_u:501: bahavas tatra sambādhā yatra mando viṣīdati //
T07udanav_u:502: śrāmaṇye carate yas tu sva cittam anivārayet /
T07udanav_u:503: punaḥ punar viṣīdet sa saṃkalpānām vaśam gataḥ //
T07udanav_u:505: duhkhā asamāna saṃvāsā duhkhāś ca upacitā bhavāḥ // [duhkhāsamāna saṃvāsā]
T07udanav_u:506: kāṣāya kaṇṭhā bahavaḥ pāpa dharmā hy asamyatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:507: pāpā hi karmabhiḥ pāpair ito gacchanti durgatim /
T07udanav_u:508: yo asāv atyanta duhśīlaḥ sālavān mālutā yathā /
T07udanav_u:509: karoty asau tathā ātmānam yathā enam dviṣad icchati //
T07udanav_u:510: sthaviro na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā palitam śiraḥ /
T07udanav_u:511: paripakvam vayas tasya moha jīrṇaḥ sa;ucyate //
T07udanav_u:512: yas tu puṇyam ca pāpam ca prahāya brahmacaryavān /
T07udanav_u:514: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan /
T07udanav_u:515: icchā lobha samāpannaḥ śramaṇaḥ kim bhaviṣyati //
T07udanav_u:516: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan /
T07udanav_u:517: śamitam yena pāpam syād aṇu sthūlam hi sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:518: śamitatvāt tu pāpānām śramaṇo hi nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:519: brāhmaṇo vāhitaiḥ pāpaiḥ śramaṇaḥ śamita aśubhaḥ /
T07udanav_u:520: pravrājayitvā tu malān uktaḥ pravrajitas tv iha //
T07udanav_u:522: ārya satyāni catvāri prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:523: eṣa mārgam prajānāti bhava tṛṣṇā pradālanam //
T07udanav_u:524: uddhatam hi rajo vātair yathā vṛṣṭena śāmyati /
T07udanav_u:525: evam śāmyanti saṃkalpāḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā //
T07udanav_u:526: śreṣṭhā hi prajñā loke asmin yā iyam nirveda gāminī /
T07udanav_u:527: yayā samyak prajānāti jāti maraṇa saṃkṣayam //
T07udanav_u:528: mārgeṣv aṣṭa aṅgikaḥ śreṣṭhaś catvāry āryāṇi satyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:529: śreṣṭho virāgo dharmāṇām cakṣuṣmān dvipadeṣu ca //
T07udanav_u:530: anityān sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:531: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:532: duhkham hi sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:533: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:534: śunyataḥ sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā / [śūnyataḥ]
T07udanav_u:535: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:537: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:538: ākhyāto vo mayā mārgas tv ajñāyai śalya kṛntanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:539: yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam ākhyātāras tathā gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:540: deśito vo mayā mārgas tṛṣṇā śalya nikṛntanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:541: yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam deṣṭāro hi tathā gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:542: eṣo hi mārgo na asty anyo darśanasya viśuddhaye /
T07udanav_u:544: eṣo añjaso hy eṣa ca vai parākrame tv eka ayano haṃsa patho yathā hrade /
T07udanav_u:545: yam adhyagāt śākya muniḥ samāhitas tam eva ca ākhyāti gaṇeṣv abhīkṣṇaśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:546: eka ayanam jāti jarā anta darśī mārgam vadaty eṣa hita anukampī /
T07udanav_u:547: etena mārgeṇa hi tīrṇavantas tariṣyate ye prataranti ca ogham //
T07udanav_u:548: atyanta niṣṭhāya damāya śuddhaye saṃsāra jātī maraṇa kṣayāya /
T07udanav_u:549: aneka dhātu pratiṣaṃvidhāya mārgo hy ayam lokavidā prakāśitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:550: gaṅgā gatam yadvad apeta doṣam saṃsyandate vāri tu sāgareṇa /
T07udanav_u:551: tathā eva mārgaḥ sugata pradeśitaḥ saṃsyandate ayam hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
T07udanav_u:552: yo dharma cakram hy ananuśrutam purā prāvartayat sarva bhūta anukampī /
T07udanav_u:553: tam tādṛśam deva nara agra sattvam nityam namasyeta bhavasya pāragam // [devanarāgrasatvam]
T07udanav_u:554: sadā vitarkān kuśalān vitarkayet sadā punaś ca akuśalān vivarjayet /
T07udanav_u:555: tato vitarkāṃś ca vicāritāni ca prahāsyate vṛṣṭir iva uddhatam rajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:556: sa vai vitarka upaśamena cetasā spṛśeta sambodhi sukham hy anuttaram /
T07udanav_u:557: śubham samādhim manasā nibandhayed vivekajam bhāvayitvā apramāṇam /
T07udanav_u:558: pradālayitvā tribhir ālayāṃs trīn jahāti bandhān nipakaḥ pratismṛtaḥ //
T07udanav_u:559: prajñā āyudho dhyāna bala upapetaḥ samāhito dhyāna rataḥ smṛta ātmā /
T07udanav_u:560: lokasya buddhvā hy udaya vyayam ca vimucyate vedakaḥ sarvato asau //
T07udanav_u:561: sukham sukha arthī labhate samācaran kīrtim samāpnoti yaśaś ca sarvataḥ /
T07udanav_u:562: ya;āryam aṣṭa aṅgikam āñjasam śivam bhāvayati mārgam hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
T07udanav_u:564: phalam vai kadalim hanti phalam veṇum phalam naḍam /
T07udanav_u:565: satkāraḥ kāpuruṣam hanti sva garbho aśvatarīm yathā //
T07udanav_u:566: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:567: hanti bālasya śukla aṃśam mūrdhānam ca asya pātayet //
T07udanav_u:568: asanto lābham icchanti satkāram ca eva bhikṣuṣu /
T07udanav_u:569: āvāseṣu ca mātsaryam pūjām para kuleṣu ca //
T07udanav_u:570: mām eva nityam jānīyur gṛhī pravrajitas tathā /
T07udanav_u:571: mama prativaśāś ca syuḥ kṛtya akṛtyeṣu keṣucit //
T07udanav_u:573: anyā hi lābha upaniṣad anyā nirvāṇa gāminī //
T07udanav_u:574: etaj jñātvā yathā bhūtam buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:576: na vyāyameta sarvatra na anyeṣām puruṣo bhavet /
T07udanav_u:577: na anyām nihśritya jīveta dharmeṇa na vaṇik caret //
T07udanav_u:578: sva lābham na avamanyeta na anyeṣām spṛhako bhavet /
T07udanav_u:579: anyeṣām spṛhako bhikṣuḥ samādhim na adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:580: sukham jīvitum icchet cet śrāmaṇya artheṣv avekṣavān /
T07udanav_u:581: ahir mūṣaka durgam vā seveta śayana āsanam //
T07udanav_u:582: sukham jīvitum icchet cet śrāmaṇya artheṣv avekṣavān /
T07udanav_u:583: itaretareṇa saṃtuṣyed eka dharmam ca bhāvayet //
T07udanav_u:584: sukham jīvitum icchet cet śrāmaṇya artheṣv avekṣavān /
T07udanav_u:585: sāṃghikam na avamanyeta cīvaram pāna bhojanam //
T07udanav_u:586: alpa jñāto api ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:587: vidvāṃsas tam praśaṃsanti śuddhājīvam atandritam // [śuddha ājīvam]
T07udanav_u:588: traividyaḥ syāt sa ced bhikṣur mṛtyu hantā nirāsravaḥ /
T07udanav_u:589: alpa jñātam iti jñātvā hy avajānanty ajānakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:590: sa ced bhavati traividyo mṛtyu hāyī nirāsravaḥ /
T07udanav_u:591: jñātvā alpa jñāta;iti tam avajānanty ajānakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:592: sa cet tv iha anna pānasya lābhī bhavati pudgalāḥ /
T07udanav_u:593: pāpa dharmā api ced bhavati sa teṣām bhavati pūjitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:594: bahūn amitrān labhate saṃghāṭī prāvṛtaḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:595: lābhī yo hy anna pānasya vastra śayyā āsanasya ca //
T07udanav_u:596: etad ādī navam jñātvā satkāreṣu mahā bhayam / [ādīnavam]
T07udanav_u:597: alpa jñāto hy anutsukaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:598: na ayam anaśanena jīvate na āhāro hṛdayasya śāntaye /
T07udanav_u:599: āhāraḥ sthitaye tu vidyate taj jñātvā hi careta;eṣaṇām //
T07udanav_u:600: paṅkas tv iti yo hi vindate nityam vandana mānanā kule /
T07udanav_u:601: sūkṣmaḥ śalyo duruddharaḥ satkāraḥ kāpuruṣeṇa dustyajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:603: akruddhasya hi yaḥ krudhyet karma pāpam akurvataḥ /
T07udanav_u:604: duhkham tam eva spṛśati loke asmiṃś ca paratra ca //
T07udanav_u:605: pūrvam kṣiṇoti ha ātmānam paścād bāhyam vihiṃsati /
T07udanav_u:606: sa hatas tv itaram hanti vītaṃsena iva pakṣiṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:607: hantāram labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati /
T07udanav_u:608: akroṣṭāram tathā ākroṣṭā roṣitāram ca roṣakaḥ // [ākroṣṭāram]
T07udanav_u:610: āyuṣy evam paritte hi vairam kurvanti kenacit //
T07udanav_u:611: pṛthak śabdāḥ samutpannās tam ca śreṣṭham iti manyathā / [pṛthak chabdāḥ]
T07udanav_u:612: saṃghe hi bhidyamāne asmin śreṣṭham ity abhimanyathā //
T07udanav_u:613: asthi chidām prāṇa hṛtām gava aśva dhana hāriṇām / [asthicchidām]
T07udanav_u:614: rāṣṭram vilumpatām caiva punar bhavati saṃgatam /
T07udanav_u:615: yuṣmākam nu katham na syād imam dharmam vijānatām //
T07udanav_u:616: asthi chinnāḥ prāṇa harā gava aśva dhana hārakāḥ / [asthicchināḥ]
T07udanav_u:617: rāṣṭrāṇām ca viloptāras teṣām bhavati saṃgatam /
T07udanav_u:618: yuṣmākam nu katham na syād imam dharmam vijānatām //
T07udanav_u:619: paṇḍita ābhā parāmṛṣṭā vāg yā gocara bhāṣiṇī /
T07udanav_u:620: vyāyacchanti mukham vāmā yayā nītā na te budhāḥ //
T07udanav_u:621: pare hi na vijānanti vayam atra udyamāmahe /
T07udanav_u:622: atra ye tu vijānanti teṣām śāmyanti medhakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:623: ākrośan mām avocan mām ayojan mām ajāpayet /
T07udanav_u:624: atra ye hy upanahyanti vairam teṣām na śāmyati //
T07udanav_u:625: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet /
T07udanav_u:626: atra ye na upanahyanti vairam teṣām praśāmyati //
T07udanav_u:627: na hi vaireṇa vairāṇi śāmyanti iha kadācana /
T07udanav_u:628: kṣāntyā vairāṇi śāmyanti eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:629: vairam na vaireṇa hi jātu śāmyet śāmyed avaireṇa tu vaira bhāvaḥ /
T07udanav_u:630: vaira prasaṅgo hy ahitāya dṛṣṭas tasmādd hi vairam na karoti vidvān //
T07udanav_u:631: sa cel labhed vai nipakam sahāyam loke caran sādhu hi nityam eva /
T07udanav_u:632: abhibhūya sarvāṇi parisravāṇi careta tena āpta manā smṛta ātmā //
T07udanav_u:633: no cel labhed vai nipakam sahāyam loke caran sādhu hi nityam eva /
T07udanav_u:634: rājā iva rāṣṭram vipluam prahāya ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryāt //
T07udanav_u:635: caraṃś ca na adhigaccheta sahāyam tulyam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:636: eka caryām dṛḍham kuryān na asti bāle sahāyatā //
T07udanav_u:637: ekasya caritam śreyo na tu bālaḥ sahāyakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:638: ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryād alpa utsuko araṇya gataiva nāgaḥ //
T07udanav_u:639: ekasya caritam śreyo na tu bāla sahāyatā /
T07udanav_u:640: alpa utsukaś cared eko mātaṅga araṇye nāgavat //
T07udanav_u:644: sa;imam bhāsate lokam abhra muktaiva candramāḥ //
T07udanav_u:645: sthitena kāyena tathaiva cetasā sthito niṣaṇṇo apy athavā śayānaḥ /
T07udanav_u:646: nityam smṛto bhikṣur adhiṣṭhamāno labheta pūrva aparato viśeṣam /
T07udanav_u:647: labdhvā ca pūrva aparato viśeṣam adarśanam mṛtyu rājasya gacchet //
T07udanav_u:648: smṛtiḥ kāya gatā nityam saṃvaraś ca indriyaiḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:649: samāhitaḥ sa jānīyāt tena nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:650: yasya syāt sarvataḥ smṛtiḥ satatam kāya gatā hy upasthitā /
T07udanav_u:651: no ca syān no ca me syān na bhaviṣyati na ca me bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:652: anupūrva vihāravān asau kālena uttarate viṣaktikām //
T07udanav_u:653: yo jāgaret smṛtimān samprajānaḥ samāhito mudito viprasannaḥ /
T07udanav_u:654: kālena dharmān mīmāṃsamānaḥ so atikramej jāti jarām saśokām //
T07udanav_u:655: tasmāt sadā jāgarikām bhajeta yo vīryavān smṛtimān apramattaḥ /
T07udanav_u:656: samyojanam jāti jarām ca hitvā iha eva duhkhasya karoti so antam //
T07udanav_u:657: jāgarantaḥ śṛṇudhvam me suptāś ca pratibudhyata /
T07udanav_u:658: supteṣu jāgaram śreyā na hi jāgarato bhayam //
T07udanav_u:660: amṛtam ca adhimuktānām astam gacchanti āsravāḥ //
T07udanav_u:661: lābhas teṣām manuṣyāṇām ye buddham śaraṇam gatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:662: yeṣām divā ca rātrau ca nityam buddha gatā smṛtiḥ //
